reviews.review: A timeless masterpiece

This game was revolutionary for it's time and it still holds up today the graphics are truly stunning for the time that it was made and the gun play is still good for today's standards. The negative is that the platforming in the game isn't the best, and you will die from a lot of cheap falls.All in all this game is fun and worth playing for the price.

I only started playing this because I wanted to play HL1 before I played HL2 because that's just how I am. I ended up spending 30 hours playing the game, playing HL:BS and HL:OF, and getting halfway through the fan-made Black Mesa reboot simply because I loved this game so much. It's a game that stands the test of time - still enjoyable over 20 years later. 

PROs:
- A revolutionary game at the time. The brand new engine and storytelling was game-changing (pun intended) and effected many games that came after it. 
- Gameplay is never boring. A wide range of enemies and a vast array of weapons, all of which are useful. Some games that incorporate a lot of guns fail to actually incorporate [i] useful [/i] guns - HL1 is not like that. 
- Not too hard but not too easy, with boss fights also being appropriately challenging. 
- Really stands the test of time. I may be a little biased because I love retro games, but this is certainly a game that anyone can enjoy, especially if you love Valve's engines. 
- Solid story
- Goes on sale for dirt cheap. $10 is definitely worth it but you're better off waiting until it's like $2 because why not, Valve makes enough money. 

CONs:
- Enemy AI seem to be twice as intelligent as Friendly AI which was a big f*ck you.
- F*ck Valve

Overall: definitely a 10/10

Легендарный шедевр, один из лучших шутеров и одна из лучших игр в принципе. Спустя более 20 лет после выхода играется по прежнему отлично. Великолепный геймплей, сюжет и атмосфера. Играл в конце 90-ых, начале 2000-ых, с удовольствием прошёл и сейчас. 
Стоит поиграть всем любителям игр.

Basically the best gaming investment you'll ever make. Focused primary gameplay loop, exceptional story/lore, one of the founding precursors to modern FPS, universally positive review and excellent replayability. One of the first games I ever purchased on Steam and haven't looked back at the decision since.

Challenging but manageable, requires some thinking to get through some harder parts, but absolutely engaging, intense with plenty of simple but effective bits of horror

What an incredible and innovative game. It's amazing the way they tell the story without using cutscenes. You remain in control of your character the entire time. The graphics are great as well. I can't wait for all the sequels this game is sure to get. I bet there will be at least 2 more games so it will be a complete trilogy. It will be exciting to see what happens to Gordan Freeman in the hands of that strange man at the end of the game. Hmm he needs a name... Well the game has a lambda on it so maybe I'll call him L-Man. Can't wait to see the satisfying conclusion to this story.

Muito interessante a  proposta do game, de uma invasão alien na terra e descobrir todo o plot por trás disso.
  Interessante notar q o jogo passa por varios cenários diferentes com novas mecanicas nelas, e isso deixou ele bem imersivo. Sem contar os inimigos "surpresa" q casualmente aparecem no cenário pr tirar o seu conforte de uma sala "finalmente limpa", isso te faz ficar atento o jogo inteiro. A ficção e ou plot para novas armas tb é algo interessante, sendo ele, fazendo um marco de um novo arco dentro da história.
 Tem umas coisas do meu desagrado como algumas mecanicas diferentes n terem sido apresentadas, e com isso atrapalhar a progressão do jogo.
me encanta este juego, lo estoy jugandi de nuevo por nostalgia
This is a okay game, But I prefer if you pick up Black Mesa instead.

Play it.

Over 2 decades after it's release, Half Life 1 is still a fantastic game, coming from someone who's never touched the games before now. Couple problems here and there; follower ai can feel stupid at times, i've gotten stuck in the geometry too many times to count making me have to go back to a prior save, and a weird glitch where steam says I was still playing the game long after I quit, bumping my playtime from 15 hours to 40. (though that last issue is more likely a steam problem than a Half Life one.), but despite all that, I had a great time playing through the game.

Eu estou escrevendo essa review antes de completar a história, mas pelo o que eu joguei até agora eu estou curtindo bastante. Half-Life é um jogo de 1998 com história, gameplay e mecânicas interessantes. Após 8 horas de jogatina mal posso esperar para acabar o primeiro e sair jogando o segundo e os dois episódios em seguida e planejo até rejogar esse jogo em forma do Black Mesa. Se você está pensando em se aventurar no universo de Half-Life assim como eu fiz, vale a pena pegar esse jogo, em promoção você acha ele por um preço bem baixo eu peguei minha cópia por 2 reais.

Ok acabei de zerar. Mto bom 9/10
